TextBlock.Text: MELINA: I don't see a projection stone here.
CALAD: No, but there is a way forward. Perhaps we must delve deeper before we may depart.
CALAD: We would do well to perform a thorough assesment of this projection if we do not wish to return later.
PRIMM: If I am correct, Projection Anchor 1 is located between here and the entrance. This should allow us to find our way back to the projection pool when needed.
